verses.verse: At<WG1722> that<WG1565> time<WG2540> Jesus<WG2424> went<WG4198> on the sabbath day<WG4521> through<WG1223> the corn<WG4702>; and<WG1161> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> were an hungred<WG3983>, and<WG2532> began<WG756> to pluck<WG5089> the ears of corn<WG4719>, and<WG2532> to eat<WG2068>.

But<WG1161> when the Pharisees<WG5330> saw<WG1492> it, they said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Behold<WG2400>, thy<WG4675> disciples<WG3101> do<WG4160> that which<WG3739> is<WG1832> not<WG3756> lawful<WG1832> to do<WG4160> upon<WG1722> the sabbath day<WG4521>.

But<WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Have ye <WG314> not <WG3756> read <WG314> what <WG5101> David <WG1138> did <WG4160> , when <WG3753> he <WG846> was an hungred <WG3983> , and <WG2532> they <WG3326> that were with him <WG846> ;

How <WG4459> he entered into <WG1525><WG1519> the house <WG3624> of God <WG2316> , and <WG2532> did eat <WG5315> the shewbread <WG740><WG4286> , which <WG3739> was <WG2258> not <WG3756> lawful <WG1832> for him <WG846> to eat <WG5315> , neither for <WG3761> them which <WG3326> were with him <WG846> , but <WG1508> only <WG3441> for the priests <WG2409> ?

Or <WG2228> have ye <WG314> not <WG3756> read <WG314> in <WG1722> the law <WG3551> , how that <WG3754> on the sabbath days <WG4521> the priests <WG2409> in <WG1722> the temple <WG2411> profane <WG953> the sabbath <WG4521> , and <WG2532> are <WG1526> blameless <WG338> ?
But <WG1161> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , That <WG3754> in this place <WG5602> is one<WG2076> greater than <WG3187> the temple <WG2411> .

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> ye had known <WG1097> what <WG5101> this meaneth <WG2076> , I will have <WG2309> mercy <WG1656> , and <WG2532> not <WG3756> sacrifice <WG2378> , ye would <WG302> not <WG3756> have condemned <WG2613> the guiltless <WG338> .
For <WG1063> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> is <WG2076> Lord <WG2962> even <WG2532> of the sabbath day <WG4521> .
And<WG2532> when he was departed<WG3327> thence<WG1564>, he went<WG2064> into<WG1519> their<WG846> synagogue<WG4864>:

¶ And<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, there was<WG2258> a man<WG444> which had<WG2192> his hand<WG5495> withered<WG3584>. And<WG2532> they asked<WG1905> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Is it lawful<WG1487><WG1832> to heal<WG2323> on the sabbath days<WG4521>? that<WG2443> they might accuse<WG2723> him<WG846>.

And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, What <WG5101> man <WG444> shall there be <WG2071> among <WG1537> you <WG5216> , that <WG3739> shall have <WG2192> one <WG1520> sheep <WG4263> , and <WG2532> if <WG1437> it <WG5124> fall <WG1706> into <WG1519> a pit <WG999> on the sabbath day <WG4521> , will he <WG2902> not <WG3780> lay hold <WG2902> on it <WG846> , and <WG2532> lift it out <WG1453> ?
How much <WG4214> then <WG3767> is a man <WG444> better than <WG1308> a sheep <WG4263> ? Wherefore <WG5620> it is lawful <WG1832> to do <WG4160> well <WG2573> on the sabbath days <WG4521> .

Then<WG5119> saith<WG3004> he to the man<WG444>, Stretch forth <WG1614> thine <WG4675> hand <WG5495> . And<WG2532> he stretched it forth<WG1614>; and<WG2532> it was restored<WG600> whole<WG5199>, like as<WG5613> the other<WG243>.
¶ Then<WG1161> the Pharisees<WG5330> went out<WG1831>, and held<WG2983> a council<WG4824> against<WG2596> him<WG846>, how<WG3704> they might destroy<WG622> him<WG846>.

But<WG1161> when Jesus<WG2424> knew<WG1097> it, he withdrew himself<WG402> from thence<WG1564>: and<WG2532> great<WG4183> multitudes<WG3793> followed<WG190> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> he healed<WG2323> them<WG846> all<WG3956>;
And<WG2532> charged<WG2008> them<WG846> that<WG3363> they should<WG4160> not<WG3363> make<WG4160> him<WG846> known<WG5318>:
That<WG3704> it might be fulfilled<WG4137> which<WG3588> was spoken<WG4483> by<WG1223> Esaias<WG2268> the prophet<WG4396>, saying<WG3004>,

Behold<WG2400> my<WG3450> servant<WG3816>, whom<WG3739> I have chosen<WG140>; my<WG3450> beloved<WG27>, in<WG1519> whom<WG3739> my<WG3450> soul<WG5590> is well pleased<WG2106>: I will put<WG5087> my<WG3450> spirit<WG4151> upon<WG1909> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> he shall shew<WG518> judgment<WG2920> to the Gentiles<WG1484>.
He shall<WG2051> not<WG3756> strive<WG2051>, nor<WG3761> cry<WG2905>; neither<WG3761> shall any man<WG5100> hear<WG191> his<WG846> voice<WG5456> in<WG1722> the streets<WG4113>.

A bruised<WG4937> reed<WG2563> shall he<WG2608> not<WG3756> break<WG2608>, and<WG2532> smoking<WG5188> flax<WG3043> shall he<WG4570> not<WG3756> quench<WG4570>, till<WG2193><WG302> he send forth<WG1544> judgment<WG2920> unto<WG1519> victory<WG3534>.
And<WG2532> in<WG1722> his<WG846> name<WG3686> shall<WG1679> the Gentiles<WG1484> trust<WG1679>.

¶ Then<WG5119> was brought<WG4374> unto him<WG846> one possessed with a devil<WG1139>, blind<WG5185>, and<WG2532> dumb<WG2974>: and<WG2532> he healed<WG2323> him<WG846>, insomuch that<WG5620> the blind<WG5185> and<WG2532> dumb<WG2974> both<WG2532> spake<WG2980> and<WG2532> saw<WG991>.
And<WG2532> all<WG3956> the people<WG3793> were amazed<WG1839>, and<WG2532> said<WG3004>, Is<WG2076> not<WG3385> this<WG3778> the son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>?

But<WG1161> when the Pharisees<WG5330> heard<WG191> it, they said<WG2036>, This<WG3778> fellow doth<WG1544> not<WG3756> cast out<WG1544> devils<WG1140>, but<WG1508> by<WG1722> Beelzebub<WG954> the prince<WG758> of the devils<WG1140>.

And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> knew<WG1492> their<WG846> thoughts<WG1761>, and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Every <WG3956> kingdom <WG932> divided <WG3307> against <WG2596> itself <WG1438> is brought to desolation <WG2049> ; and <WG2532> every <WG3956> city <WG4172> or <WG2228> house <WG3614> divided <WG3307> against <WG2596> itself <WG1438> shall <WG2476> not <WG3756> stand <WG2476> :

And <WG2532> if <WG1487> Satan <WG4567> cast out <WG1544> Satan <WG4567> , he is divided <WG3307> against <WG1909> himself <WG1438> ; how <WG4459> shall <WG2476> then <WG3767> his <WG846> kingdom <WG932> stand <WG2476> ?

And <WG2532> if <WG1487> I <WG1473> by <WG1722> Beelzebub <WG954> cast out <WG1544> devils <WG1140> , by <WG1722> whom <WG5101> do your <WG5216> children <WG5207> cast them out <WG1544> ? therefore <WG5124><WG1223> they <WG846> shall be <WG2071> your <WG5216> judges <WG2923> .

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> I <WG1473> cast out <WG1544> devils <WG1140> by <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316> , then <WG686> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is come <WG5348> unto <WG1909> you <WG5209> .

Or <WG2228> else how <WG4459> can <WG1410> one <WG5100> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> a strong man's <WG2478> house <WG3614> , and <WG2532> spoil <WG1283> his <WG846> goods <WG4632> , except <WG3362> he first <WG4412> bind <WG1210> the strong man <WG2478> ? and <WG2532> then <WG5119> he will spoil <WG1283> his <WG846> house <WG3614> .

He that is <WG5607> not <WG3361> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> is <WG2076> against <WG2596> me <WG1700> ; and <WG2532> he that gathereth <WG4863> not <WG3361> with <WG3326> me <WG1700> scattereth abroad <WG4650> .

¶ Wherefore <WG1223><WG5124> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , All manner of <WG3956> sin <WG266> and <WG2532> blasphemy <WG988> shall be forgiven <WG863> unto men <WG444> : but <WG1161> the blasphemy <WG988> against the Holy Ghost <WG4151> shall <WG863> not <WG3756> be forgiven <WG863> unto men <WG444> .

And <WG2532> whosoever <WG3739><WG302> speaketh <WG2036> a word <WG3056> against <WG2596> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> , it shall be forgiven <WG863> him <WG846> : but <WG3739> whosoever <WG1161><WG302> speaketh <WG2036> against <WG2596> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> , it shall <WG863> not <WG3756> be forgiven <WG863> him <WG846> , neither <WG3777> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> world <WG165> , neither <WG3777> in <WG1722> the world to come <WG3195> .

Either <WG2228> make <WG4160> the tree <WG1186> good <WG2570> , and <WG2532> his <WG846> fruit <WG2590> good <WG2570> ; or else <WG2228> make <WG4160> the tree <WG1186> corrupt <WG4550> , and <WG2532> his <WG846> fruit <WG2590> corrupt <WG4550> : for <WG1063> the tree <WG1186> is known <WG1097> by <WG1537> his fruit <WG2590> .

O generation <WG1081> of vipers <WG2191> , how <WG4459> can ye <WG1410> , being <WG5607> evil <WG4190> , speak <WG2980> good things <WG18> ? for <WG1063> out of <WG1537> the abundance <WG4051> of the heart <WG2588> the mouth <WG4750> speaketh <WG2980> .

A good <WG18> man <WG444> out of <WG1537> the good <WG18> treasure <WG2344> of the heart <WG2588> bringeth forth <WG1544> good things <WG18> : and <WG2532> an evil <WG4190> man <WG444> out of <WG1537> the evil <WG4190> treasure <WG2344> bringeth forth <WG1544> evil things <WG4190> .

But <WG1161> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213> , That <WG3754> every <WG3956> idle <WG692> word <WG4487> that <WG3739><WG1437> men <WG444> shall speak <WG2980> , they shall give <WG591> account <WG3056> thereof <WG4012><WG846> in <WG1722> the day <WG2250> of judgment <WG2920> .
For <WG1063> by <WG1537> thy <WG4675> words <WG3056> thou shalt be justified <WG1344> , and <WG2532> by <WG1537> thy <WG4675> words <WG3056> thou shalt be condemned <WG2613> .

¶ Then<WG5119> certain<WG5100> of the scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> of the Pharisees<WG5330> answered<WG611>, saying<WG3004>, Master<WG1320>, we would<WG2309> see<WG1492> a sign<WG4592> from<WG575> thee<WG4675>.

But<WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, An evil <WG4190> and <WG2532> adulterous <WG3428> generation <WG1074> seeketh after <WG1934> a sign <WG4592> ; and <WG2532> there shall no <WG3756> sign <WG4592> be given <WG1325> to it <WG846> , but <WG1508> the sign <WG4592> of the prophet <WG4396> Jonas <WG2495> :

For <WG1063> as <WG5618> Jonas <WG2495> was <WG2258> three <WG5140> days <WG2250> and <WG2532> three <WG5140> nights <WG3571> in <WG1722> the whale's <WG2785> belly <WG2836> ; so <WG3779> shall the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> be <WG2071> three <WG5140> days <WG2250> and <WG2532> three <WG5140> nights <WG3571> in <WG1722> the heart <WG2588> of the earth <WG1093> .

The men <WG435> of Nineveh <WG3536> shall rise <WG450> in <WG1722> judgment <WG2920> with <WG3326> this <WG5026> generation <WG1074> , and <WG2532> shall condemn <WG2632> it <WG846> : because <WG3754> they repented <WG3340> at <WG1519> the preaching <WG2782> of Jonas <WG2495> ; and <WG2532> , behold <WG2400> , a greater than <WG4119> Jonas <WG2495> is here <WG5602> .

The queen <WG938> of the south <WG3558> shall rise up <WG1453> in <WG1722> the judgment <WG2920> with <WG3326> this <WG5026> generation <WG1074> , and <WG2532> shall condemn <WG2632> it <WG846> : for <WG3754> she came <WG2064> from <WG1537> the uttermost parts <WG4009> of the earth <WG1093> to hear <WG191> the wisdom <WG4678> of Solomon <WG4672> ; and <WG2532> , behold <WG2400> , a greater than <WG4119> Solomon <WG4672> is here <WG5602> .

<WG1161> When <WG3752> the unclean <WG169> spirit <WG4151> is gone <WG1831> out of <WG575> a man <WG444> , he walketh <WG1330> through <WG1223> dry <WG504> places <WG5117> , seeking <WG2212> rest <WG372> , and <WG2532> findeth <WG2147> none <WG3756> .

Then <WG5119> he saith <WG3004> , I will return <WG1994> into <WG1519> my <WG3450> house <WG3624> from whence <WG3606> I came out <WG1831> ; and <WG2532> when he is come <WG2064> , he findeth <WG2147> it empty <WG4980> , swept <WG4563> , and <WG2532> garnished <WG2885> .

Then <WG5119> goeth he <WG4198> , and <WG2532> taketh <WG3880> with <WG3326> himself <WG1438> seven <WG2033> other <WG2087> spirits <WG4151> more wicked <WG4191> than himself <WG1438> , and <WG2532> they enter in <WG1525> and dwell <WG2730> there <WG1563> : and <WG2532> the last <WG2078> state of that <WG1565> man <WG444> is <WG1096> worse than <WG5501> the first <WG4413> . Even so <WG3779> shall it be <WG2071> also <WG2532> unto this <WG5026> wicked <WG4190> generation <WG1074> .

¶ While<WG2089> he<WG846> yet<WG1161> talked<WG2980> to the people<WG3793>, behold<WG2400>, his mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> his<WG846> brethren<WG80> stood<WG2476> without<WG1854>, desiring<WG2212> to speak<WG2980> with him<WG846>.

Then<WG1161> one<WG5100> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Behold<WG2400>, thy<WG4675> mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> brethren<WG80> stand<WG2476> without<WG1854>, desiring<WG2212> to speak<WG2980> with thee<WG4671>.

But<WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto him that told<WG2036> him<WG846>, Who <WG5101> is <WG2076> my <WG3450> mother <WG3384> ? and <WG2532> who <WG5101> are <WG1526> my <WG3450> brethren <WG80> ?

And<WG2532> he stretched forth<WG1614> his<WG846> hand<WG5495> toward<WG1909> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and said<WG2036>, Behold <WG2400> my <WG3450> mother <WG3384> and <WG2532> my <WG3450> brethren <WG80> !

For <WG1063> whosoever <WG3748><WG302> shall do <WG4160> the will <WG2307> of my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> , the same <WG846> is <WG2076> my <WG3450> brother <WG80> , and <WG2532> sister <WG79> , and <WG2532> mother <WG3384> .
